snippet: The Philippine leader said that if Beijing decided to develop the Scarborough Shoal, the United States would be forced to defend the Philippines or risk losing credibility.
abstract: Philippine Pres Benigno S Aquino III says Chinese attempt to reclaim Scarborough Shoal, reef off island nation's coast, would necessitate military response from United States; move would be latest in series of Chinese provocations in disputed South China Sea.
lead_paragraph: The Philippine leader said that if Beijing decided to develop the Scarborough Shoal, the United States would be forced to defend the Philippines or risk losing credibility.

headline.main: Benigno Aquino Says U.S. Must Act if China Moves on Reef in South China Sea
headline.print_headline: Philippine Leader Sees U.S. Role in Countering China

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
